mapper.select: SELECT c.company_name, c.company_address, j.title, j.start_date, c.company_image, IFNULL(SUM(s.score)/COUNT(s.user_id), 0) AS rating, j.job_history, CASE WHEN j.end_date IS NULL THEN '상시' ELSE CONCAT('D-', DATEDIFF(j.end_date, NOW())) END AS end_date, j.job_post_no FROM tbl_job_post j LEFT JOIN tbl_company c ON j.company_id = c.company_id LEFT JOIN tbl_company_score s ON j.company_id = s.company_id WHERE j.start_date <= NOW() AND (j.end_date IS NULL OR j.end_date >= NOW()) GROUP BY j.job_post_no, j.company_id, c.company_name, c.company_address, j.title, j.start_date, j.end_date, c.company_image ORDER BY rating DESC LIMIT 6

SELECT j.company_id, c.company_name, c.company_address, j.title, j.start_date, c.company_image, j.job_history, CASE WHEN j.end_date IS NULL THEN '상시' ELSE CONCAT('D-', DATEDIFF(j.end_date, NOW())) END AS end_date, j.job_post_no FROM tbl_job_post j LEFT JOIN tbl_company c ON j.company_id = c.company_id LEFT JOIN tbl_company_score s ON j.company_id = s.company_id WHERE j.start_date <= NOW() AND (j.end_Date IS NULL OR j.end_date >= NOW()) GROUP BY j.job_post_no, j.company_id, c.company_name, c.company_address, j.title, j.start_date, j.end_date, c.company_image ORDER BY end_date asc LIMIT 6

SELECT j.company_id, c.company_name, c.company_address, j.title, j.start_date, c.company_image, j.job_history, j.job_post_no, CASE WHEN j.end_date IS NULL THEN '상시' ELSE CONCAT('D-', DATEDIFF(j.end_date, NOW())) END AS end_date FROM tbl_job_post j LEFT JOIN tbl_company c ON j.company_id = c.company_id LEFT JOIN tbl_company_score s ON j.company_id = s.company_id LEFT JOIN (SELECT company_id, like_type FROM tbl_like WHERE like_type = 'U' AND user_id = #{id}) l ON j.company_id = l.company_id WHERE j.start_date <= NOW() AND (j.end_Date IS NULL OR j.end_date >= NOW()) AND l.like_type = 'U' GROUP BY j.job_post_no, j.company_id, c.company_name, c.company_address, j.title, j.start_date, j.end_date, c.company_image ORDER BY end_date asc LIMIT 6;
